node.title: Former employee testifies he brought underage girls to Epstein's estate
node.alt: A courtroom sketch shows Ghislaine Maxwell seated at the defense table while watching testimony of a witness.
node.description: Jeffrey Epstein had "many, many, many" female guests at his Palm Beach estate, including two who appeared to be underage, a former employee testifies at Ghislaine Maxwell's sex trafficking trial.
node.content:
["Jeffrey Epstein had \"many, many, many\" female guests at his Palm Beach estate, including two who appeared to be underage, a former employee has testified at Ghislaine Maxwell's sex trafficking\u00a0trial.", "Juan Alessi, Mr Epstein's\u00a0Palm Beach house manager, took the stand for the prosecution on the fourth day of Ms Maxwell's trial in Manhattan Federal Court on Thursday, local time.", "He said he repeatedly drove two girls who appeared to be 14 or 15 years of age to Epstein's Florida estate.", "One of the girls \u2014\u00a0now a woman in her early 40s using the pseudonym Jane in court \u2014\u00a0testified earlier in the week about how Ms Maxwell, a daughter of late media baron Robert Maxwell, groomed Jane\u00a0for abuse by Epstein when she was 14.", "Mr Alessi \u2014\u00a0who managed Epstein's Palm Beach property from 1991 to 2002 \u2014\u00a0said Jane appeared to be 14 or 15 years of age when she first came to the house with her mother in 1994.", "After that, Mr Alessi said, he would drive Jane alone to the home, where she spent time with Ms Maxwell and Mr Epstein.", "He said that he saw Jane's name in a directory of massage therapists that he would call to schedule massages for Mr Epstein, sometimes at Ms Maxwell's direction.", "Jane testified that many of her sexual encounters with Mr Epstein would start as massages before escalating.", "", "
Ghislaine Maxwell's trial in New York is expected to last about six weeks.(AP)
", "Prosecutor Lara Pomerantz has said massages were a \"ruse designed to get young girls to touch Epstein\".", "He recalled that, when he began working for Mr Epstein, the financier would get one massage a day, but that, years later, he would often get three.", "Prosecutors say Ms Maxwell recruited and groomed underage girls for Mr Epstein to abuse between 1994 and 2004 and participated in some of the sexual encounters.", "Ms Maxwell, 59, has pleaded not guilty to eight counts of sex trafficking and other charges.", "Lawyers for Ms Maxwell say prosecutors are scapegoating her because Mr Epstein is no longer alive.", "Mr Epstein killed himself, at age 66, in a Manhattan jail cell in 2019 while awaiting trial on sex abuse charges.", "Earlier on Thursday, psychologist Lisa Rocchio testified as an expert witness about how underage victims of sexual abuse were often \"groomed\" by perpetrators they know well, and that many do not disclose abuse until they reach adulthood.", "", "
Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide while awaiting trial on sex-trafficking charges in 2019.(AP: New York State Sex Offender Registry)
", "
'I was supposed to be blind, deaf and dumb'
", "In eight hours of often emotional, explicit testimony, Jane said she had sexual encounters with Mr Epstein between the ages of 14 and 16 in Palm Beach and at his ranch in New Mexico.", "She said Ms Maxwell participated in many of the encounters.", "Mr Alessi described Jane as \"strikingly beautiful\". He said he once drove Jane, who was carrying luggage, from the Palm Beach home to an airport and watched her board a plane with Mr Epstein, Ms Maxwell and Ms Maxwell's dog, a small Yorkie named Max.", "Ms Maxwell's lawyers have sought to highlight discrepancies between Jane's testimony and her earlier interviews with law enforcement, when she did not discuss Ms Maxwell's role.", "They contend that the memories of Jane and three other accusers expected to testify against Ms Maxwell have been corrupted over time, and that they have financial incentives to implicate her.", "Mr Alessi said he saw topless women hanging out by the pool hundreds of times. Jane also recalled seeing topless women by the pool.", "He said most female guests were in their twenties, but recalled two who appeared to be underage: Jane, and Virginia Roberts, now known as Virginia Giuffre.", "", "
Virginia Giuffre nee Roberts has not said publicly whether she will testify at Ghislaine Maxwell's trial.(AP: Bebeto Matthews)
", "Ms Giuffre has said she was a victim of Mr Epstein's sex trafficking and abuse from 2000 to 2002, starting when she was 16.", "Mr Alessi recalled driving Ms Maxwell to Mar-a-Lago \u2014 former US\u00a0president Donald Trump's Florida property \u2014 to meet Ms Giuffre, and that he sometimes drove her to Mr Epstein's home.", "Mr Alessi said he found sex toys in Mr Epstein's massage room four or five times after his employer had received massages.", "He recalled cleaning one of the toys, which he said \"looked like a huge men's penis with two heads\", and put it in a basket in Ms Maxwell's bathroom.", "\"That's the place where it was kept,\" Mr\u00a0Alessi said.", "He also said he was given a booklet of detailed instructions, warning him to keep Mr Epstein's and Ms Maxwell's activities or whereabouts secret.", "\"I was supposed to be blind, deaf and dumb,\" Mr Alessi said.", "Reuters"]
